name: tatva software
overview:
Making Mobility Happen - Its all we do!

Who We Are

tatva software was started in early 2011 to address the need of an evolving intelligent mobile device market by offering a wide range of designs and solutions. tatva has believed in delivering ultimate experience to consumers who are on the go and who are looking to maximize their productivity in the field of mobility and embedded devices. tatva has a unique experience being part of enterprise and embedded solutions making us an ideal choice for typical challenges in enterprise mobility like Security, Deployment, Management and compliance. At tatva we are highly focused on increasingly popular technologies and intelligent devices making us most reliable development partner for customers worldwide.

The core team behind tatva has been instrumental in running many successful ventures in varied sectors including IT, Marketing Services and Healthcare. At tatva, the core team envisions building capabilities and expertise in the domain of Android based intelligent mobile devices. In a short span of a year, tatva is already recognised by multi-Fortune 500 companies to be the sole reliable expert in the domain of Android based intelligent devices. Headquartered in Bangalore, tatva is a multi-national organisation having teams working out of multiple cities in India and also from Seoul, South Korea
